Re: All Games of Illusion & Community

Sex/Cross Sphere [DEMO] (ILLUSION) [uncen] [2016, 3D, Simulator] [jap]

Year: 2016

Genre: 3D, Simulator

Censorship: None

Platform: PC/ WindowsXP / WindowsVista / Windows7 / Windows8

Language: jap

System requirements:

Windows 7/8.1/10(32/64bit) | CPU:Intel Core i3 | RAM:3GB | HDD:500MB | VRAM:1GB

Description:

This is what we know about the game so far :

This game sole male is a shota, a cute pint-sized guy who looks like a small girl, and there is no alternative protagonist. If you're into tall and manly heroes, you're out of luck.

It will feature cross-dressing. Expect this little dude to be sometime dressed as a female and have sex with tomboyish girls wearing male uniforms, as seen in the 02/05 CM.

The game will also feature 8 heroines with various body proportions and personalities. And one of those girls is the protagonist big sister, so... there may be incest.

Illusion said their game will focus on character personalities instead of customisation, which means you won't be able to create characters nor customise the existing ones. So, nope, you sadly won't be able to change the girls boobs sizes nor the guy height. At this point, we don't even know if we will be able to change their clothes and haircuts.

The story will progress through some kind of "drag and match" mini-game (whose exact mechanics are still unknown) in a similar fashion of what you can find in HuniePop.

File Size: 158 MB

Description:

Justin goes to a vacation with his sister and his mother in a tropical island, far away from home.

The goal is to reach all of the sexual scenes in the game.

I don't have a better goal in mind for now...

--Press 'E' to open the inventory / relations window.

For now only the sister has relations parameters since she is the only one these are relevant for.

--Press 'Escape' to open the main menu.

--There are 4 daily phases, morning, noon, after noon and evening / night.

At every phase npcs will randomly go to any of the 4 locations (There will be more).

You can pass time at each location to get the npcs at other places again. Some npcs are

required to be in specific locations for specific events...

Night time will have different events which depend on the npc's relations with Justin.

Description:

1) 4 Episode 1 head version 1.1, which has the subtitle Enchant Edition. Advantageously differs from the version 1.0, located in the main distribution, correcting critical bugs (the quest to cure for an orc) and the addition of a few new scenes (such as 2 Futanari + Aria + Ellie, Jaina + Alor + Ellie and so on.) The disadvantage - only English, Russian no;

2) The first remake of the first episode, version 0.6. He was not completed, because Auril decided to go on UE4, but still contains enough content (it managed to make just about half, as can be understood from the version) to be of interest. With it, you can estimate what could turn out a remake, compared with those who eventually came out. Russian language is present in part and has obvious problems with fonts. However, you can play with it. An example would be on screen;

3) The prologue to the second episode of the second chapter. The first game in the series, jumping to a new engine (in addition to her second remake of the first epiozda, as well as the second and third episodes of the second chapter). The plot tells the story of why the shipwreck happened and what was going on directly in front of him. All the action goes from Daemii face. Unlike other games, it does not require installing / unpacking, simply run OST_Game.exe administrator;

4) Pre-trial beta version Whorecraft. So this part of the call itself. But it would be better to call it the alpha version. It justifies this game full name: Whorecraft The Chronicles of Alexstrasza.

It is another card, a completely different story, and most importantly - the other SG-nya. Alexstrasza. The game is crooked in terms of quality animation, but other interesting features - such as the ability to track the progress of jobs. Alas, it will never be completed. But as part of the history, such as where it all began - very interesting. In addition, a certain amount of content available there, too: I counted 9 scenes.

5) 3 episode 2 head version 1.0. Russian language is present partially - transferred about half of the plot scenes and dialogues and scenes of the minor. Most of them, and the entire second half - no text, so I recommend just play in English, because during a language you can not switch the scene, and saves the system is not working.

The episode ends the series storyline and offers 3 endings of your choice. Once it Epilogue will and apparently everything.

Extras. Information: Run as administrator, as always.

Description:

Breeders of the Nephelym is an immersive, beautifully erotic 3D adventure game centered around catching and breeding the Nephelym, an enigmatic race of monster-human hybrids.

There are no loading screens at all, no annoying cutscenes, and the camera was programmed from the ground up to be a seamless smooth transition between every mode. Features were added to increase control over your breeder--you can at any time remove all or particular pieces of clothing. You have control over the different phases of any sex scene, and complete freedom with camera movement and speed.

And yes, breasts, butts, and even the belly will bounce during animations!

To further immersion more, graphical beauty is a priority. Lighting is high quality and lots of foliage is used. I realize this comes with steeper hardware requirements than your average hentai game, so I have tried to optimize where possible, and it will be possible to scale down rendering quality if needed.

Further on the quest for highest quality hentai game, I went all out and implemented a customized industry-grade fur system.

Control:

"W" "s" "a" & "d" to move

"E" for action commands, for example, when you can talk

"1" removes the shirt of the PC

"2" removes pants or shorts if a woman

"3" removes the panties of a female cosmona

"4" again takes off his shoes, if a woman

"C" removes all PC clothes

The "right mouse button" is an escape from the actions that it also displays in the save menu

"Num 8" open the gallery

Description:

As a homecoming gift from your loyal henchmen, you are given a beautiful captive to do with however you please. She must do as you wish and satisfy you and the others with her body, obeying your every command for 30 days. You must train her well to suit the high-quality needs of you and your men to earn her freedom. Of course, with your expert training regime, Miku may also greatly enjoy her stay while in the company of her captors! With your training, she can become less and less a timid captive and can turn into a seducing pet with a wild, unquenchable lust. Will she earn her freedom, or will she choose to stay and play even more in the depths of your secret lair?

The Northwood Lair is a constantly developing 3D R18+ project for a hardcore audience where you are the owner of a secret realm known as The Northwood Lair, and master of your strong henchmen and monsters.

As the master of your realm, you will not be bothered to wait for romantic progression; fulfill your every want and desire whenever you wish! This project features many different adult encounters with multiple henchmen, monsters, and beasts.

Two times each day, you may choose to have her entertain either yourself or your loyal henchmen, with each act providing her valuable experience in her goal to satisfy you by the end of the 30th day. Each scene has successive animation stages and can be repeated as much as you wish. Change your prisoner's outfit, body type, bind her with rope, have her strike a seductive pose, be gentle or rough, the choice is yours!

Also included with The Northwood Lair project is a 2.5D beta adult side scrolling adventure game!

Carefully guide Miku through the dangerous environment to the other side to reach the goal

Enemies will force Miku to pleasure them in several erotic ways if caught

Special bonus Game Over erotic scenes, do not worry if you fail!

Waves of unique enemies that Miku must avoid, each with different erotic animations

Beside your secret lair is the Overworld, a place where you can travel to for commercial entertainment! Here your captive can dance in full view of the public or accompany them behind the nearest building while you entertain yourself with the other erotic merchants!

Visit the local tavern for a drink or strike up a conversation with one of the girls! Fill your night with their company in any way you wish!

Your lair has many locations to visit for your captive's training! Have her await your henchmen in a prison cell, perform magical summons in the Arcanium, and more!
